pages.text: And when Moses said to his nation: "Remember/mention God`s blessing/goodness on you, when He saved/rescued you from Pharaoh`s family, they impose upon you the torture`s harm/evil , and they slaughter your sons and they shame your women, and in that is a great test from your Lord
